channel.title: [PI]Class5 into entitydef for models

item.title: [PI]Class5 into entitydef for models
item.dc:creator: @Tyler_Hostility Tyler_Hostility
item.description:
@Tyler_Hostility wrote:

Not sure if this belongs in client help since it has to do with client or if it belongs in model requests/help but… I’ve learned how to successfully change class8 into itemdef, etc. But I am having troubles changing class5 for npc models into entitydef…

This is what I need to change, I’ll give an example of what I need it changed into.
